landing.title: Schedule Your Donation, Save Lives
landing.subtitle: Book your blood or plasma donation online in minutes. Join thousands of donors making a difference every day.
landing.donorRegistrationDesc: New to Vitalita? Register as a donor or login to your existing account to manage appointments.
landing.bookDonationDesc: Our advanced booking system will guide you step by step through the process. Complete eligibility checking, smart scheduling, and instant confirmation.

processSteps.step1: Start the Conversation - Use our advanced booking wizard or chat with the virtual assistant
processSteps.step2: Identity Verification - Secure identification with your name, AWS center, and donor ID with birth generation
processSteps.step3: Eligibility & Scheduling - Advanced eligibility checking and smart scheduling with real-time availability
processSteps.step4: Instant Confirmation - Multiple delivery options, QR codes, calendar integration and automated reminders

landing.transformManagement: Transform Blood Donation Management — See How Vitalita Can Help

easyBooking.title: Easy Booking
easyBooking.desc: Book your donation in just a few clicks with our virtual assistant.

guaranteedSafety.title: Guaranteed Safety
guaranteedSafety.desc: All AWS centers meet the highest safety standards.

awsCommunity.title: AWS Community
awsCommunity.desc: Join thousands of donors across the country.

flexibleHours.title: Flexible Hours
flexibleHours.desc: Many available times to fit your schedule.

voiceAssistant.title: Voice Assistant
voiceAssistant.desc: Hands-free booking with our intelligent voice agent.

smartScheduling.title: Smart Scheduling
smartScheduling.desc: Real-time availability, Live slot checking, Capacity management, Conflict detection

eligibilityChecking.title: Eligibility Checking
eligibilityChecking.desc: Medical history review, Annual holds, Health screening

saveLives.title: Save Lives
saveLives.desc: One donation saves up to 3 people.

loginMode.title: Vitalita Portal
loginMode.subtitle: Choose your login type to continue
